about_the_game:
GAMEPLAY


Robert is hitman. His task is simple. Kill everybody who’s asking questions while at the same time not ask them himself. The game represents a hellish mix of many genres, the main ones are adventure and top-down shooter. During the day walk around the city, drink cheap beer in the bar, philosophize with hobos in an abandoned building and many more interesting interactions. And in the night go to “work”. Mercilessly destroy everything that doesn’t stand or lay straight. Fight bandits, find secret telling the story of the game’s world and hangout with your friends, gradually sinking into the dark atmosphere of the game. Have fun!

FEATURES


  • The game is made without financing by an independent studio, consisting only of four people
  • Crossing completely different genres, which gifts you with new gaming experience
  • Dynamic fights, every single one of which needs special approach
  • Cool music, where you can hear all from cheerful dubstep to acoustic guitar melodies
  • Drink hammered with your friends, duel with toy pistols to powerful dubstep and many more!

CHAPTERS


Scarecrow consists of three chapters. The first one introduces you to the world of the game and main mechanics. The other two will expand on the story. All chapters are included in the price of the game and will be added gradually automatically.
